testsuite.name: com.buildpiper.testcases.RepoIntegrationTestCases
testsuite.system-out: checking if driver exist Element : xpath: //span[contains(@class,'shopping-basket-button')]//span[text()='Integrations']]is displayed on screen Clicking on element Integration button under side bar Element : xpath: //a[@href='/repo/list']]is displayed on screen Clicking on element Repo Integration button under Integration button Element : xpath: //button[contains(@class,'btn btn-primary-v2')][text()=' Add Repo']]is displayed on screen Element is present xpath: //button[contains(@class,'btn btn-primary-v2')][text()=' Add Repo']] Element : xpath: //button[contains(@class,'btn btn-primary-v2')][text()=' Add Repo']]is displayed on screen Clicking on element clicks on add repo button Element : xpath: //input[@name='name' and @placeholder]]is displayed on screen Element : xpath: //a[@href='/secrets/add']]is displayed on screen Clicking on element adds new secret Result upload to testlink is disabled, Please ensure you have 'UpdateTestLink=Yes' in project.properties ####### End of Test Case: AddSecretsOnAddRepoPage #######
